div.div: VIEWED 5 MILLION TIMES IN ONE WEEK

div.a: Behind The 'Sandy Hook Truther' Conspiracy Video

div.div: You're watching "The Sandy Hook Shooting - Fully Exposed," the most comprehensive summary of the bizarre "Sandy Hook Truther" movement you can find on the internet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZUI4Ux&via=Digg&text=Behind The 'Sandy Hook Truther' Conspiracy Video

div.a: How Anonymous Got Westboro To Back Off Aaron Swartz's Funeral

div.div: Westboro Baptist Church and the do-gooder hacktivists from Anonymous faced off over the ongoing Aaron Swartz suicide controversy on Tuesday — albeit briefly — and in a sign of Anonymous's growing power, the hackers won.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VhoORU&via=Digg&text=How Anonymous Got Westboro To Back Off Aaron Swartz's Funeral

div.a: Growing The Next Great American Industry

div.div: As more states have legalized medical marijuana and the first inroads are made into full weed legalization in the United States, a new crop of businessmen have positioned themselves to surf the rising market tide for marijuana and marijuana-related products.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XbhLI9&via=Digg&text=Growing The Next Great American Industry

div.div: DON'T STAND SO, DON'T STAND SO CLOSE TO ME

div.a: The Last Thing You Should Do When You Run Across A Rhino

div.div: A young West Rand student who was attacked by a rhino at the weekend was reportedly advised by the game park owner to move closer to the animals to pose for pictures.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xa037Y&via=Digg&text=The Last Thing You Should Do When You Run Across A Rhino

div.a: The 19-Year-Old Activist Making Life Hell For Louisiana's Creationists

div.div: It all started back in 2008 when an outraged Zack Kopplin wrote a research paper on on a bill making it easier for teachers to introduce creationist textbooks in the classroom. Nearly five years later, the 19-year-old Kopplin has become one of the fiercest — and most feared — advocates for education reform in Louisiana.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11xAuV0&via=Digg&text=The 19-Year-Old Activist Making Life Hell For Louisiana's Creationists

div.a: Husband Of Aaron Swartz's Prosecutor Criticizes Activist's Family Over Twitter

div.div: IBM executive married to district attorney tweets anger after family suggests overzealous prosecution contributed to his death.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SFBmEs&via=Digg&text=Husband Of Aaron Swartz's Prosecutor Criticizes Activist's Family Over Twitter

div.div: Different sections of the country wear very different kinds of glasses, it turns out.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RYdjyZ&via=Digg&text=A Nation Divided (By Hipster Glasses)

div.div: A popular saying goes that programmers are machines that turn caffeine into code.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W2zxyb&via=Digg&text=Why Programmers Work At Night

div.div: Smoked cheese, or suluguni, is a tasty snack that will pair nicely with beer. Also, it's mesmerizing to see how it's made.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V0OpgT&via=Digg&text=How Smoked Cheese Is Made

div.a: 70 Years Ago Today, Strom Thurmond's Mistress Was Put To Death

div.div: Seventy years ago today, a South Carolina woman named Sue Logue was executed for hiring another man to kill her neighbor who had previously killed her husband over a feud involving a dead calf. What makes the story more interesting is that before her arrest, Logue was having an affair with Strom Thurmond. Yes, that Strom Thurmond.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W9r7Vs&via=Digg&text=70 Years Ago Today, Strom Thurmond's Mistress Was Put To Death

div.div: COULD BLIND DATES GET ANY WORSE?

div.a: OkCupid Finally Comes Up With Worst Idea Ever

div.div: We mocked the New York Times for proclaiming that courtship is dead because straight millennial men are only interested in hooking up. (And eating mac and cheese. Mmm.) But today, thanks to OKCupid's new standalone "Crazy Blind Date" app, we feel a little differently. Maybe love really is obsolete?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W9LuBZ&via=Digg&text=OkCupid Finally Comes Up With Worst Idea Ever

div.a: Grisly Revolving Door Accident Claims Office Dog's Life

div.div: Alan TBH Plumptre was usually carried in designer handbags and had 2,500 followers on Twitter.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VfUZRY&via=Digg&text=Grisly Revolving Door Accident Claims Office Dog's Life

div.a: The 'Star Wars' Response To The White House Response To The Death Star Petition

div.div: "The overwhelming military superiority of the Galactic Empire has been confirmed once again by the recent announcement by the President of the United States that his nation would not attempt to build a Death Star, despite the bellicose demands of the people of his tiny, aggressive planet."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X2irPf&via=Digg&text=The 'Star Wars' Response To The White House Response To The Death Star Petition

div.a: Gun Lovers Freaking Out Over Price Gouging

div.div: In a strange bit of irony, gun owners who helped fuel the post-Newtown surge in sales are now shocked to discover that they're being overcharged.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uo4Zr1&via=Digg&text=Gun Lovers Freaking Out Over Price Gouging

div.a: The Best Party Scene In The Middle East

div.div: Behind high walls, Saudi Arabia's restrictive Islamic laws don't apply.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W5cKSd&via=Digg&text=The Best Party Scene In The Middle East

div.a: A Hilarious Behind-The-Scenes Tour Of Montana’s Natural History Museum

div.div: Did you know that the University of Montana's Natural History Museum is the largest zoological museum in Montana? Did you also know that it's the best spot on campus to watch an orgy?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13zxBTd&via=Digg&text=A Hilarious Behind-The-Scenes Tour Of Montana’s Natural History Museum

div.a: 'The Atlantic,' The Church Of Scientology, And The Perils Of Native Advertising

div.div: The Atlantic, the 157-year-old magazine, whipped the Internet into a frenzy last night after journalists noticed a peculiar story about the Church of Scientology on the magazine’s website.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W5wGnh&via=Digg&text='The Atlantic,' The Church Of Scientology, And The Perils Of Native Advertising

div.a: What A CES Press Conference Is Like When You're Hungover

div.div: Like most journalists everywhere, I am hungover. I am sat in the basement of a hotel on the outskirts of Munich; the sort of hotel that must have sprung up fully-formed overnight, a massive swelling of glittering commerce emerging from the abandoned building sites and car parks and motorways that ring the city.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13uXanA&via=Digg&text=What A CES Press Conference Is Like When You're Hungover

div.a: The Inside Story Of Facebook's Graph Search

div.div: For years now, Facebook watchers have wondered when the company would unleash the potential of its underpowered search bar. That day has has come.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10x5PIc&via=Digg&text=The Inside Story Of Facebook's Graph Search

div.a: Getting The Body You've Always Wanted

div.div: 1) Wait until at least April, when the ground softens. 2) Dress warmly (think layers), bring a shovel and a lantern on a stick.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10wIXIO&via=Digg&text=Getting The Body You've Always Wanted

div.a: A Senator's Lonely Crusade To Learn The CIA's Secrets

div.div: Ron Wyden is entitled to know the rules that surround targeted killing and all the countries where America is killing people. But no one will tell him.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10wf0IQ&via=Digg&text=A Senator's Lonely Crusade To Learn The CIA's Secrets

div.a: If You Lose Your Cellphone, Don't Blame Wayne Dobson

div.div: In the past two years, Wayne Dobson has been pestered by people showing up at all hours of the day and night at his house, demanding their phones. They've yelled, shown him evidence, called the police - sworn that their phone is in his house. But he's no thief. He's just the victim of a bug in phone-tracking software.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WCBy2w&via=Digg&text=If You Lose Your Cellphone, Don't Blame Wayne Dobson

div.a: Conspiracy Theorists Hound Man Who Saved Six Newtown Kids

div.div: Gene Rosen sheltered six kids during the Sandy Hook massacre. Now he's become a target of conspiracy theorists.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V6MSKf&via=Digg&text=Conspiracy Theorists Hound Man Who Saved Six Newtown Kids

div.a: Why White Bread Tastes Better Than Whole Wheat

div.div: Everyone knows that whole wheat bread is a whole lot healthier than white. So why is it that even the health-obsessed among us still crave white bread?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZDdVcq&via=Digg&text=Why White Bread Tastes Better Than Whole Wheat

div.a: Man Arrested For Flipping Off Cops Could Win $2.1M Civil Rights Lawsuit

div.div: Aneury Peralta says he's become a target of the NYPD stemming from an ugly verbal altercation with an officer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xb3dbl&via=Digg&text=Man Arrested For Flipping Off Cops Could Win $2.1M Civil Rights Lawsuit

div.a: Facebook 'Graph Search' Mines 1 Billion People, 1 Trillion Connections

div.div: Facebook has announced that it's improving its search experience with "Graph Search," a new way to search between Facebook's massive amount of photos, people, and connections that Mark Zuckerberg says is "not web search."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/107bWlv&via=Digg&text=Facebook 'Graph Search' Mines 1 Billion People, 1 Trillion Connections

div.a: DARPA Wants Robots That Can Hide On The Seafloor For Years, Launch On Demand

div.div: The Navy's 'Upward Falling Payloads' could hide in the ocean depths until needed, then launch to quickly create a distributed presence across a maritime region.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13zdg08&via=Digg&text=DARPA Wants Robots That Can Hide On The Seafloor For Years, Launch On Demand

div.div: EVERYONE WANTS TO BE ON OPRAH
Lance Armstrong didn't just suddenly decide to admit to using performance enhancing drugs. Here's what led him to finally come clean.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZR1yJT&via=Digg&text=Behind Armstrong's Decision To Talk
